title: "I was not Paid to Appear on #BBNaija" â€” Banky W | YabaLeftOnline
text:
tweet 
Banky W has officially replied housemate Giftyâ€™s claims that he was paid to appear on the show days ago. 
Recall that the music boss visited the housemates as a special guest to speak with, and inspire, the housemates on how best to mine the platform they have been given. While many of them enjoyed Bany Wâ€™s visited, Gifty thought differently during her Diary Session. 
According to the housemate, she doesnâ€™t know who Banky W is, felt he was too full of pride, especially because of the way he carried himself â€“ as though he was paid to appear on the show. 
Her comments stirred reactions on social media yesterday. Many Nigerians had unkind things to say about the housemate and Banky W fueled the negative reactions too. 
â€œTo be fair, I dunno know her much either,â€ he tweeted yesterday, adding, â€œopinions are like assholes and everyone has one and is entitled to it. Doesnâ€™t mean it isnâ€™t full of sh*t.â€ 
However, the EME boss returned last night to officially address the claims, while asking Nigerians to quit dragging the housemate. AD: How to satisfy your woman for over 40 mins in bed - Click Here to Read! 
â€œNot sure why she feels like I have â€œproudnessâ€ğŸ˜©ğŸ˜‚, but I certainly wasnâ€™t paid to appear. I was in town for another gig and the producers asked if I could come on as a favour and give the contestants some advice that will be helpful to them down the line, which is all I tried to do,â€ Banky W said in his post. 
See the full post below: 
Lol..okay, Quick thoughts: 
Yall shld pls try and have mercy on her. 1) Not sure why she feels like I have â€œproudnessâ€ğŸ˜©ğŸ˜‚, but I certainly wasnâ€™t paid to appear. I was in town for another gig and the producers asked if I could come on as a favour and give the contestants some advice that will be helpful to them down the line, which is all I tried to do. I think all the other contestants enjoyed our time together so itâ€™s all good. 2) The thoughts I shared werenâ€™t for the contestants alone; hopefully my words were beneficial to all the viewers at home. 3) Itâ€™s okay if Gifty, or anyone else doesnâ€™t know who I am. I never assume that they do, or that they should. Pls if you donâ€™t know me, feel free to epp my career â€“ Google me or look up my music catalogue on YouTube.. or watch the wedding party movie. Whenever Gifty does make it home, she will have the opportunity to do the same. Lastly, big thank you to the #bbnaija Producers for having me on. I truly enjoyed my time on the show, and I always gain a sense of fulfilment whenever I get the chance to share my story and life lessons with people.
